runs.comm: his first delivery seams in off a length, and Shahzad is away by tucking the ball of his hip, and out to the other outfielder at long leg.
past the edge! This hit the seam but went the other way, away from the bat, to beat Usman Ghani's drive.
good bounce and carry! Muzarabani dug this one in a little shorter, and it spat off a length and past the splice of the bat. Play and a miss.
slashed over point! Ghani charged down the track at this length delivery and swiped at it. It was a wild stroke, but an effective one.
slower ball, and it's the offcutter. Ghani waits on it and chops to gully.
misfield at point from Williams, and he's given away four runs. The ball was slapped hard, but straight at him. He got down, but not quickly enough and the ball zipped past him.
good start! A full ball swings in sharply, and Ghani taps it back to the bowler. Bobby fields in his follow through, and threatens to throw down the stumps - much to the home crowd's delight.
well bowled once again. This left the bat off the pitch, and and Ghani was squared up as he shaped to play to leg.
beats the drive now! Ghani charged out at the bowler, but Mpofu fired this very full and quite wide outside off.
fired down very full on a middle stump line. It's not quite the yorker, and so the batsman is able to work him through square leg for one.
nice placement from Shahzad. He worked a length delivery to midwicket, where a huge gap had been left. The bowler sets off after the ball, and they rush through for two.
good end to the over. It's a slower ball just outside off, and Shahzad is slightly wrong-footed as he taps it to cover. The batsmen test the fielder with a quick single.
an offcutter, at slightly reduced pace, comes in to the bat off the track. Shahzad waits at the crease and nudges to midwicket.
Muzarabani ducks for cover! Shahzad swung mightily at this length delivery, and the bowler was in danger as it rocketed back at him. Mid off is across in a flash to palm it down.
Ghani drives, and the edge dies just in front of Mutumbami. He seemed to get a touch of glove on it, but not enough to stop it from running away for four
play and a miss this time. Ghani's feet didn't move, and his bat flashed underneath the length delivery.
beaten for pace this time! Muzarabani was just short of a good length, and the ball whizzed past Ghani's pull, hitting him in the stomach and rolling back, not too far away from the stumps.
flat-batted back past the bowler this time, but he's not timed it very well and so mid off can get around to keep them to one.
Mpofu steams in to deliver a full-pace delivery, which rises off a length and is spliced towards square leg.

ramped over the vacant slip region! I don't think Shahzad was aiming for a particular spot with this shot, he just backed away and flicked a cut at the ball. Mpofu followed him with the short ball, but he connected to get four to third man.
very full, right on the toes, and it's clipped to short fine leg. The fielder there stops it cleanly, but they chance a single.
punched to mid on, who is right on the edge of the circle, so there's ample time for a single.
clever batting from the portly wicketkeeper. He shuffled way back to leg to create room, knowing that third man was up, and sliced a length delivery down to the boundary.
Mpofu's change-up is a yorker on off stump, and it's dug out into the covers. The batsmen charge through for another.
Shahzad backs away, but the ball takes the cue-end of the bat and rolls straight to short third man.
fired down flat and fast outside off. Shahzad had made room again, backing away to leg, and he opted to leave this alone. But it's well within the line, not a wide.
spanked past mid off! Shahzad really muscled this one, and the mid off fielder dived over the ball.
chopped into the covers.
another quick ball, and it beats Shahzad's pull to strike him on the belly. It's a stinging blow, and he walks away to rub it.

driven hard back to the bowler, who picks it up and threatens to throw down the stumps. There's a lovely conversation between bowler and batsman, and Umpire Tiffin had to step in to cool everyone down.
whipped off the pads, in front of square, for a single.
Shahzad backs away and clubs a drive through cover point. The fielder gets half a hand to it to take some of the power out of the shot.
up and over short third man! Shahzad backed away to a dart on off stump, and slashed hard at the ball to get it over the fielder.
no stopping this! Shahzad wanders towards square leg yet again, with the bowler coming round the wicket, and blasted the ball through the covers. None of the fielders moved.
Shahzad moves forward to drive to long on.
flicked towards midwicket, where Raza sprints in from the edge of the circle to deny the single.
he's gone! Shahzad bends low and slugs a slog sweep straight to Ervine at midwicket. He was the only fielder inside the ring on the leg side.
neat little stroke to get off the mark, Sadiq waiting on a length ball outside off and opening the face to run it to third man. Waller sprints after it.
more work for Waller, as Sadiq paddle sweeps to fine leg. Waller is after it from short third man, but he can't quite get there.
tapped into the covers.
a sliced cut bisects Chigumbura at point and Waller at short third, and once again Waller is on the sprint. He hauls it in just short.
now he's forward on the drive to drive to long off.
sharp single! The ball is cut just to the left of point, and the throw is rocketed back to the keeper as the batsmen sprint across ... The stumps are broken, but he's safe.
looped down full on off stump, and it's nudged back to the bowler.

bowled him! Ghani has been struggling to put the ball away, and the pressure has eventually told. He jumped down the track and swung wildly, his head pointed to the sky, and the ball shuttled straight on with the arm to disturb the stumps.
a length delivery on off stump is chopped to point.
Wellington gives it some air, and the ball lands full on middle and leg. It's driven to long on
nudged off the toes, and the ball goes in front of square on the leg side for a quick single.
he comes round the wicket to loop the ball down on off stump. It's tapped almost straight to Chibhabha at extra cover, but the batsmen chance a single. A good run in the end, as his throw goes wide.

another chancy single! Now it goes to point, but the call is immediate. This time the throw hits the stumps, but the umpire says he's safe. We have no TV replays to double check that. It looked very close.
nicely stopped by Chigumbura, diving to his right at point. He's certainly saved runs, but the batsmen push for another single.
high over long on! There was a fielder out there, and for a while he thought he might be on for a catch, but the ball just kept going, eventually landing on the stand beneath the scoreboard.
crunched down to long off.
arrowed down flat and fast on off stump, and it's dug out back to the bowler.
flighted full and wide, and it's nudged to extra cover.
Sadiq comes down the track and heaves, but swipes past the ball. Fortunately for him, it hits his pad so he's not stumped.
there's a stifled appeal as the batsman sweeps now, missing the ball, but it's pitched well outside leg.
he's down the track again, and this time he lifts the ball over extra cover. The cover sweeper runs around to cut it off.
paddled through square leg, into the gap.
flicked just to the right of Ervine at midwicket, and the batsmen hustle another single.
that will help the required rate! Stanikzai jumps out and shellacks a huge shot over wide long on. It lands several rows back.

direct hit from the deep! It's Chris Mpofu out there, on the cover boundary. The ball was hit to his right, and the batsmen thought two runs were on. They would have been were it not for his bullet arm and the direct hit. Shades of his dismissal of Ricky Ponting at the 2011 World Cup.
sliced down to the left of short third man, Waller cuts it off.
flicked through midwicket, and the batsmen are quick off the mark for another single.
Nabi backs away to crack a drive out to Mpofu on the cover boundary. Just the single ...
caught behind! Williams came over the wicket, and this pitched on middle and spun away. Sadiq pressed forward, and Mutumbami held the thin edge. Second wicket in the over for Zimbabwe.
flicked into space, right between the midwicket and long on fielders, and they push for two.
driven out square of the wicket, and the sweeper rushes in.
the left hander comes forward to push the ball through cover point.
nudged off the pads, into space on the leg side.
that's a little too short for a medium pacer, but he's not punished for it. Najibullah rolls his wrists on the pull to keep it down.
eased down to long on, one more.
great stop by Chigumbura at point. He had to dive to his left, but he stopped Nabi's cut cleanly to stop the single.
flicked off the pads, through midwicket.
clubbed back at the bowler with plenty of bottom hand. Chisoro gets down on the turf to stop it.
Najibullah sets himself for a front foot pull, but he swipes over the ball and is hit on the thigh.
Najibullah is forward to drive the ball hard into the covers, and Chamu dives to stop the shot. Good fielding from Zimbabwe in this over.
driven hard down to long on. The bowler sticks his hand out, but he can't get anything on it.
fetched out into the leg side, from outside off. The ball rolls wide of long on, and they push for a second run.
a missed stumping! This certainly looked like it. Najibullah charged well out of the crease, but past the ball. He might have got a touch on it, but a chance goes begging.
Nabi whips across his front pad to collect a single to leg.
chipped to extra cover! Well, his first boundary is a four, but he's hit it well. He came down the track again, and deliberately hit it in the air, placing it well.
fired down on off stump, and the batsmen take a tip and run single into the covers.
swiped down to long on.
powerful strike down the ground! Nabi didn't move his feet, he just stood at the crease and smashed it away. The ball never got up very high, but it's cleared the boundary easily.
good follow up from the batsman, turning the strike over with a quick single into the leg side.
heaved down to long on, the ball bouncing down to the fielder.
chopped out to the cover sweeper, off the back foot.
a full ball, delivered from around the wicket, is sliced square on the off side.
really smart batting in this over. Having picked up the necessary boundary, the batsmen have targeted the gaps for five singles. Nabi places this one through midwicket.
full on off stump, and it's drilled to long off.

big hit! Najibullah came down the track, but he wasn't quite to the pitch of it. He swung through the predicted line, and connected sweetly. A schoolkid in the stands waited to catch it, but chickened out at the last moment.
and he turns the strike over with a flick off his toes.
darted down flat on middle and off, and Nabi can't get it past the bowler.
over extra cover! The ball wasn't exactly floated down, but it landed wide of off stump to allow the stroke. Nabi thumped it cleanly right over the head of the cover sweeper, who had run around.
chopped down to point, but the fielder denies the single.
wide outside off, and very full. Almost a yorker. Najibullah digs it out to extra cover and it's a dot ball. Zimbabwe need a whole lot more of those.
a paddle-pull gets a short ball down to fine leg.

Nabi taps to point, and they put the fielder under pressure with a quick single. Muzarabani is in front of the stumps when the throw comes his way, and can't stop it cleanly, so they get an overthrow.
very full, right up at off stump, and it's dug out back to the bowler.
drilled out past the extra cover fielder, and long off runs in.
all too easy for Najibullah. He turns a length delivery to leg, and some languid fielding allows the batsmen two runs. Zimbabwe are raising the white flag.
a rising delivery on middle and leg is nudged off the armpit to short fine leg. There's a fielder there, but they take him on, as they have all the way through the chase.
Najibullah goes to pull a length ball, delivered from around the wicket, and inside edges onto his pad. Nabi wants a single, but it's not on.
appeal for caught behind! Umpire Matibiri says no. It's a good delivery all the same. Quite wide of off, and very full indeed. It actually looked like it nipped under his bat.
a yorker on off stump is dug out just in front of point, and they take a quick single.
a length delivery nips in off the seam, and it's flicked to the man at short fine leg. If it had gone past him it was four.
clubbed in the air down to long off, the ball bouncing about ten metres in front of the fielder. Well hit, but straight at the man.
slashed to the point boundary! This will hurry the end. Muzarabani fires one full and wide outside off. But it's not full enough, and the batsman gets the meat of the bat into the shot.
that's a better delivery from the bowler, but he can't stop the single. Najibullah swings at a yorker on middle stump, and the inside edge goes to short fine leg

sharp single! Nabi dug the yorker out back down the track. Najibullah called for the single, and then it was a race between him and the bowler. Muzarabani swooped onto the ball and threw down the stumps, but the batsman was in.
play and a miss! Najibullah wanted to mow this length delivery over the leg side, but he swung right across the line and missed.
cracked hard out to Waller at deep midwicket, just the single.
well placed! Nabi used his wrists well to place this full ball between the long on and deep midwicket fielders, and the batsmen were always going to push for two.

and all it takes is one ball! Najibullah spots a length delivery on off stump and nails it straight back down the ground. It clears the ropes easily, and Afghanistan win the inaugural T20 between these two sides.
